Html: tryed to record all current sounds on vista but got only mic record. is it stupid vista twisted all or sample included in rar-file isn't full? anyway thanx for cool project and sorry for my english.

you probably need to open the soundcard control panel to set up recording all current sounds and configure the recording source. WaveOut doesn't offer that choice directly.

Mark
i can't do this - in recording settings of sound card i see only mic and line-in.
